des:
Big Sky: Better Weather for Amazon Alexa. Big Sky uses Apple Weather to give real-time weather forecasts tied to your actual street address, and for locations around the world.

QUESTIONS about Big Sky? Check out the Big Sky FAQ:
https://bigsky-weather.com/faq

or contact us at: 
bigsky.alexa@gmail.com
We will get back to you immediately and work through any issues you're having. 


"Alexa, ask Big Sky..."

...what's the high temperature today? 
...will it rain in the next three hours?
...for the barometric pressure
...what was the weather on June 1st, 1980?
...will it rain before 10 pm?
...for the humidity at 4 pm?
...give me a weather fact!
...what will the wind speed be in three hours?
...what's the low temperature in the next seven days?
...about the weather this weekend.
...when is sunrise on Saturday?
...what's the weather on Friday?

***** Want More? ******

Big Sky Premium Edition brings together tons of great features for all Alexa devices.

1. Personalized Weather Reports. Chose from a dozen options. Include an air quality report, precipitation totals, length of day, and more. 

2. Big Sky Screensaver: Tired of having your home screen filled with Amazon ads and tips? Premium screensaver displays nothing but current weather, against beautiful video and photo backgrounds. (Note: the screensaver is not a replacement for the the home screen. You must exit the screensaver to access most native Alexa features.)

3. Live World-wide radar: Swipe to pan and tap to zoom in and out. Big Sky radar is the best weather radar available on Alexa

4. . Labeled locations: Add a label to your favorite locations, e.g., "The beach" or "The golf course." Then use the label in your Big Sky weather requests, "What's the weather at beach." Or, "What's the wind speed at the golf course."

5. Custom weather alerts. Get alerted when extreme weather conditions are about to come your way. Custom weather alerts work together with labeled locations, so you can stay informed about all your locations.

Weather data provided by Apple Weather
